item.title: About
item.description: Tracking & Data Capture Regular Reporting and Dashboards Ad Hoc Analysis Analytics Development Advanced Analytics Tracking & Data Capture Google Analytics 4 Google Analytics is ubiquitous and commonly the source of truth in web, digital and marketing acquisition analytics. Google Analytics can be used stand alone or to augment your back end data with a rich set of attributes including attribution, device info, landing pages and site engagement data.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Templates A/B Testing in Google Sheets Web Analytics Data Model in Google Sheets Rstudio, Shiny and HTTPD environment with Docker Develop models or Shiny Apps and deploy using httpd, all neatly encapsulated with Docker.
